actions.text: Amendment SA 4851 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 4851 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Biden. (consideration: CR S8703-8705; text: CR S8704) To prohibit the use of funds for establishing United States military installations in Iraq or exercising United States control over the oil resources of Iraq.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4851 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4851 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Biden.

purpose: To prohibit the use of funds for establishing United States military installations in Iraq or exercising United States control over the oil resources of Iraq.
